summary: This is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel regarding the selection of mediators (Podhurst and Josefsberg) for the Epstein case and the notification of victims. It shows internal coordination and a deadline for defense team objections.

persons.name: Jay Lefkowitz
persons.role: Recipient of email, likely defense attorney or legal representative for Epstein
persons.context: Addressed in email regarding the selection of mediators and victim notification timeline; appears to be a point of contact for the defense team.

persons.name: Acosta, Alex
persons.context: Listed as cc recipient on email discussing mediator selection and victim notification in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Guy Lewis
persons.role: Former U.S. Attorney, part of Epstein defense team
persons.context: Mentioned as knowing about Judge Davis's efforts to secure mediators and being part of the Epstein defense team.

persons.name: Lili Ann Sanchez
persons.role: Attorney, part of Epstein defense team
persons.context: Listed as a member of the Epstein defense team familiar with the proposed mediators.

persons.name: Roy Black
persons.role: Attorney, part of Epstein defense team
persons.context: Listed as a member of the Epstein defense team familiar with the proposed mediators.

persons.name: Professor Dershowitz
persons.role: Law professor and defense attorney for Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as being comfortable with the mediator selection and knowing Mr. Josefsberg from law school; part of the defense team.

persons.name: Judge Davis
persons.context: The judge making efforts to secure Aaron Podhurst and Bob Josefsberg as mediators for the Epstein case agreement.

persons.name: Aaron Podhurst
persons.context: One of the two individuals selected by Judge Davis to serve as a mediator in the Epstein case; noted for legal acumen and ethics.

persons.name: Bob Josefsberg
persons.context: One of the two individuals selected by Judge Davis to serve as a mediator in the Epstein case; noted for legal acumen and ethics and known by Dershowitz from law school.

persons.name: Barry
persons.context: Mentioned in passing as someone from whom a call back is awaited about a date.

connections.description: Judge Davis selected Aaron Podhurst to serve as a mediator for the Epstein case agreement.
Judge Davis selected Bob Josefsberg to serve as a mediator for the Epstein case agreement.
Professor Dershowitz knew Bob Josefsberg from law school, indicating a prior acquaintance.
Guy Lewis is part of the Epstein defense team, which includes Lili Ann Sanchez, Roy Black, and Professor Dershowitz.
Jay Lefkowitz is the recipient of the email from the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding mediator selection and victim notification, representing the defense side.

events.title: Meeting regarding mediator selection
events.description: A meeting occurred where the selection of Judge Davis's mediators (Podhurst and Josefsberg) was discussed with Jay Lefkowitz and Professor Dershowitz.

events.title: Deadline for defense objection to mediators
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office sets a deadline of COB for the defense to provide good faith objections to the selection of Podhurst and Josefsberg as mediators.

events.title: Planned victim notification
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office plans to notify the victims of the Epstein case by letter after COB, following the agreement between the United States and Epstein.

locations: 500 S. Australian Ave, Suite 400 West Palm Beach, FL 33401
keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office is pressing for the defense team to conclude vetting of proposed mediators Aaron Podhurst and Bob Josefsberg by November 28, 2007.
The Justice for All Act of 2004 is cited as creating a statutory obligation to notify victims of upcoming events and their rights in a timely fashion.
Professor Dershowitz and other members of the Epstein defense team (Guy Lewis, Lili Ann Sanchez, Roy Black) were familiar with the proposed mediators.
The email indicates internal coordination within the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding the sensitive timeline for victim notification in the Epstein case.
